Title: A Person's Diary
Text:
Date: January 8, AL157
What: The Captain came to talk to me again today, and he wanted me, as the technical backbone, to give a decisive opinion - whether or not to continue the exploration work. He and I, and indeed everyone else, understands that the opening of the canal is vital, and that we've paid too much The Price to Pay for it, and that if we stop there, all these years of work will go down the drain, but if we go any further, we may lose untold human lives. ...... I can't convince myself of that, much less the I can't convince myself, let alone my teammates who are on edge because of TD Outbreak.
